name: Forgetful Fred
Neglectful Nancy
Clueless Carl
Absent-minded Alice
Distracted Dave
introduce: Heyyy... so... plants don't scream if I forget to water them, right?
Yo, plants are like decorative rocks, right?
I once owned a cactus. It... didn't make it.
Wait, plants need sunlight? That's new information.
I just want something green that doesn't judge me.
preferences: I need a plant that survives on good vibes and accidental neglect.
Low effort, high reward - like my lifestyle.
Preferably something photosynthesizing out of pity.
Maybe one that thrives on chaos?
recommendations: Got anything that refuses to die no matter what I do?
What's the Chuck Norris of plants?
I want something that's more resilient than my attention span.
Any plant that can live purely on confusion?
Which plant won't file a complaint if I forget it exists?
accept: Nice! Even I can't mess this up. Probably.
That's my kind of plant - lazy and proud.
Perfect, it'll fit right in with my other survivors.
reject: Whoa, that sounds like effort. Hard pass.
Eh, I don't trust that plant's attitude.
acceptExit: Thanks! If it dies, I'll just blame the sun!
Cool, time to neglect it responsibly!
rejectExit: Cool, I'll try another shop that believes in miracles.
Maybe I'll just get a fake one.
I'll meditate on this... or nap. Probably nap.

name: Moderate Mike
Balanced Brenda
Reasonable Rachel
Sensible Steve
Average Amy
introduce: Hey there! My house is half jungle, half chaos â€” and I love it!
Hi! I'm just trying to make my home feel a little more alive.
Hey! I've got plants, but I want something that really pops!
Hello! My plants are thriving... mostly.
Hey! I'm here to add a little green to my life!
preferences: Looking for something cute but not dramatic. No divas allowed.
Something easy-going, but still pretty enough for Instagram.
I want a plant that forgives, but also flourishes.
Low drama, medium watering, high vibe.
A plant that says: I'm thriving, but chill about it.
recommendations: Got any plants that thrive on medium chaos?
What's something that survives both sunlight and forgetfulness?
What's your go-to plant for normal people?
Any plant that matches a vibe of mild responsibility?
What would you recommend to someone with commitment issues... to watering?
accept: Perfect! It'll look amazing next to the one I almost overwatered!
Nice, that's exactly what I had in mind!
Awesome, I can already picture it thriving!
reject: Hmm, it's nice... but it doesn't speak to my windowsill.
Not quite the vibe I was feeling.
Maybe something a bit more... forgiving?
acceptExit: Awesome, thanks! My plants are gonna gossip about this one.
Thanks! Can't wait to introduce it to the family.
Yay! Time to rearrange my shelf for the tenth time!
rejectExit: I'll think about it. My vibe detector needs a recharge.
Thanks anyway! I'll browse a bit more.
Maybe I'll come back after my aesthetic crisis.

name: Expert Evelyn
Master Gardener Greg
Plant Professor Pete
Botanical Boss Brenda
Green Thumb Theo
introduce: Salutations! The legend of chlorophyll welcomes you!
Ah, the scent of soil and potential - how invigorating!
Hello, I come seeking my next botanical conquest!
Hark! I heard there are rare species within these walls!
preferences: I desire a plant that challenges my mighty watering can!
Something exotic, something with drama - yet discipline.
I crave a specimen worthy of both awe and fear.
Show me flora that thrives under watchful devotion.
I want a plant that will demand excellence!
recommendations: Show me something rare... something that fears neither drought nor doom!
What plants are whispered about among the true gardeners?
Give me a challenge worthy of my green thumb!
What's the apex predator of houseplants?
I seek a plant that scoffs at mediocrity.
accept: Exquisite! A worthy rival for my bonsai army!
Magnificent! I can already sense its spirit!
reject: Bah! Too simple. I seek a plant that mocks my hubris!
That one's not even trying to intimidate me.
acceptExit: Marvelous! I shall name it after myself immediately!
It shall stand tall in the Hall of Photosynthesis!
rejectExit: Farewell! I ride toward greener, riskier pastures!
Until next time - may your soil be rich and your leaves unbitten!
I go, but the hunt continues!
